//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

// Sample Name: TrivFS
//

// 
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Description
===========
  The TrivFS sample demonstrates using the D3DX utility library to initialize
  a full-screen D3D application.

Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\D3dx\Src\TrivFS

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\D3dx\Bin

Programming Notes
=================
  This sample was built using the D3DX utility library.
